name: newsroom
description: NewsRoom - A modern news platform built with Next.js and NestJS

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=shared && npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=backend && npm run lint --workspace=frontend
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=backend && npm run test --workspace=frontend
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=shared && npm install --workspace=backend && npm install --workspace=frontend
